abstract: The $1.5 billion settlement against Microsoft is only one result of the music format’s tangled history.
snippet: The $1.5 billion settlement against Microsoft is only one result of the music format’s tangled history.
lead_paragraph: AMSTERDAM, March 4 — Microsoft says it was doing the right thing: paying a German rights holder $16 million to license the MP3 audio format, the foundation of the digital music boom. Then an American jury ruled that Microsoft had failed to pay another MP3 patent holder, and slapped it with a $1.52 billion judgment.

headline.main: Patent Fights Are a Legacy of MP3’s Tangled Origins
headline.print_headline: Patent Fights Are a Legacy of MP3’s Tangled Origins

abstract: Microsoft plans to announce a contest to develop the next great digital diversion for the company’s Xbox 360.
snippet: Microsoft plans to announce a contest to develop the next great digital diversion for the company’s Xbox 360.
lead_paragraph: Reaching out to millions of aspiring game developers around the world, Microsoft plans today to announce a contest that will award $10,000 and the opportunity to entice millions of eyeballs to the next great digital diversion for the company’s Xbox 360.

headline.main: Microsoft Prize of $10,000 to Promote Xbox Games
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Prize of $10,000 To Promote Xbox Games
